message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am offering you the chance to purchase this exceptional item at a price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also my desire to ensure a fair transaction for both parties involved. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making a decision.
